BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT [UserId] FROM [Utilisateur] WHERE @mail = [Email] AND dbo.SF_GeneratePWD([Salt]+@pwd) = [Password] RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE Contact SET Prenom=@Prenom, Nom=@Nom, Surnom=@Surnom, Tel=@Tel, Email=@Email, Rue=@Rue, Num=@Num, CodePostal=@CodePostal, Ville=@Ville, Pays=@Pays WHERE ContactId=@ContactId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
